allowed: Corticoides em baixas doses (p.ex. Prednisona 0,5mg/kg/dia por 7-10 dias)

prohibitedSections.title: 1. Ácido Acetil Salicílico
items: AAS, todos os tipos de Aspirina, Buferin, Aceticil, Alidor, Anti-termin, Ronal, Doril, Cafiaspirina, Alka-seltzer, Sonrisal, Somalgin, Superist, Fontol, Hebrin, Migrane, Migral, Doloxene-A, Doribel, Coristina, Cibalena, Melhoral, Endosporin, Engove, Ecasil, Cheracap

prohibitedSections.title: 2. Paracetamol
items: Tylex, Tylenol, Vic Pyrena, Cimegripe, Buscoduo, Buscopan plus

prohibitedSections.title: 3. Dipirona
items: Novalgina, Magnopyrol, Conmel, Baralgin, Anador, Dorflex, Dexalgen, Cefaldina, Gripomatine, Algicê, Analverin, Apracur, Eucaliptol, Mionevrix, Fluviral, Buscopam composto, Lisador, Migrane, Miocitalgan, Neosaldina, Adegrip, Analginin, Cefaliv, Sedalene, Algexin, Analgex, Dornal, Dorscopena, Neuralgina

prohibitedSections.title: 5. Oxifenilbutazona
items: Tandrex, Flamanan, Algi-flamanil, Algi-peralgin, Analtrix, Febupem

prohibitedSections.title: 7. Diclofenaco de Sódio ou Potássio
items: Cataflan, Voltaren, Biofenac, Fenaren, Artren, Inflaren, Flogan, Tandrilax, Cataren, Flanaren, Algi-tanderil soft gel, Bel-gel, Clofenak gel, Biofenac Aerosol, Deltaren, Diclo-P, Diclofenax, Doriflam, Fenalflan-D, Flogonac, Gezon, Diclotaren, Dorgen, Ana-Flex, Benervan, Deltaflogin, Fenburil, Fisioren, Inflamax, Ortoflan, Beserol

prohibitedSections.title: 9. Ibuprofeno
items: Artril, Ibuprofeno, Motrin, Actiprofen, Advil, Algiflex, Benotrin, Danilon, Doretrim, Ibufram, Paratrim, Sanafen, Spidufen, Aflogen, Algi-danilon, Algifen, Fymnal

prohibitedSections.title: 10. Cetoprofeno
items: Profenid, Artrimid, Algiprofen, Biprofenid, Keduril, Artrosil

prohibitedSections.title: 13. Piroxicam
items: Feldene, Anartril, Feldox, Inflanam, Piroxifen, Piroxiflam, Brexin, Felnan, Flamadene, Flamostat, Flogoxen, Inflamene, Inflax, Lisedema, Piroxene, Piroxil

prohibitedSections.title: 14. Meloxicam
items: Movatec, Leutrol, Meloxicam, Flanatec, Inicox, Loxan, Loxiflam, Melotec, Meloxil, Movoxicam

prohibitedSections.title: 17. Nimesulida
items: Antiflogil, Deflogen, Deltaflan, Lidaflan, Neosulina, Nimeflan, Nimesilan, Nisalgen, Nisulid, Sintalgin
